alert.note: Alert for Dundy (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 9:31PM CDT until July 15 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Yuma County in northeastern Colorado... Northwestern Cheyenne County in northwestern Kansas... Southwestern Dundy County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 930 PM MDT/1030 PM CDT/. * At 829 PM MDT/929 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Wray, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 829 PM MDT a Trained spotter near Vernon reported 1 inch diameter hail. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Haigler. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 229 and 241. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
